body: We don't have this at the moment, but it would be good to add.  Since the right way to do multinomial sampling is [ziggurat](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ziggurat_algorithm) which uses rejection sampling, the infrastructure to do threaded and GPU-ified random distributions needs to be tweaked to allow multiple numbers of samples.
